findings.title: Reentrancy in permit function
findings.description: The removeLiquidityWithPermit and removeLiquidityETHWithPermit functions are vulnerable to reentrancy attacks due to their use of the permit function.

findings.title: Reentrancy in mint function
findings.description: The mint function is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks.

findings.description: The _burn function is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Reentrancy in swap function
findings.description: The swap function is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks, allowing an attacker to drain the contract's funds.

findings.description: The skim function is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks.

findings.description: The initialize function is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Unprotected updateDividendTracker function
findings.description: The updateDividendTracker function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized changes to dividend tracking.

findings.title: Unprotected updateDividendToken function
findings.description: The updateDividendToken function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected updateMinimumBalanceForDividends function
findings.description: The updateMinimumBalanceForDividends function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized changes to the minimum balance for dividends.

findings.title: Unprotected excludeFromFees function
findings.description: The excludeFromFees function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected excludeFromDividends function
findings.description: The excludeFromDividends function is declared as external and only accessible by the owner, but it lacks proper access control or validation, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected _setAutomatedMarketMakerPair function
findings.description: The _setAutomatedMarketMakerPair function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected updateGasForProcessing function
findings.description: The updateGasForProcessing function is unprotected and can lead to gas griefing attacks.

findings.title: Unprotected updateBuyFees function
findings.description: The updateBuyFees function does not have proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to modify fees.

findings.title: Unprotected updateSellFees function
findings.description: The updateSellFees function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected updateTransferFees function
findings.description: The updateTransferFees function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.description: The processDividendTracker function is vulnerable to reentrancy attacks.
